divs: Sighting DetailsI am reporting this incident on behalf of two friends of mine that witnessed something incredibly strange last Tuesday morning. I'm reporting this in the hopes that someone else may have seen this object to confirm what occurred. From what I understand, my two friends were driving home to Turner Valley from Calgary and as they were turning onto Highway 22x from McKenzie Lake Blvd in the SE of the city they witnessed a vibrant green orb that descended incredibly quickly at a 45 degree angle towards a park area. The object was described as having a bright green center, with a black circle around it and then another thin green ring. My one friend is ex-military and said he had never witnessed anything remotely like it in his life and that it was a highly unusual incident to him. He said it was no way that it was neither a helicopter or a plane and that it could not have been a flare or a meteorite because of the colour and the way that it moved. The object then disappeared in a park area by the river to the north of Highway 22x between Deerfoot Trail and McLeod Trail.
